name: Fantasy Mosaics 3
description:
Solve a variety of mosaics puzzles to help restore a beautiful garden destroyed by
a dark wizard that came from a distant alien world.

Take a journey across the universe and restore the garden to its former glory!

Now the game features two difficulty game modes and spectacular scenes of alien landscapes.


- Two difficulty game modes

- 100 custom built puzzles also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Spectacular scenes of alien worlds

- Help restore the fantasy garden
